entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story who is being advised by Aberforth to go into hiding.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and is advising Harry to leave for his own safety.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who will be in danger if they stay with Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends who will be in danger if they stay with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who explained the importance of Harry's job to him.

relationships.description: Aberforth advises Harry to go into hiding for his own safety.
Aberforth suggests that Ron should be taken with Harry when he leaves, implying that Aberforth wants to protect Ron.
Aberforth also suggests that Hermione should be taken with Harry when he leaves, implying that Aberforth wants to protect her.
Harry has been informed by Dumbledore about the importance of his job.
